data.text: @iamWadhwa We apologize for any inconvenience Sahil. I'll let your case handler know that you reached out so that we can send you an update. Please expect an email from us soon.

@rcaryala Hi manchi. Travel requirements may be found here: https://t.co/lBwTdCJvJb. Requirements may change from time to time without prior notice. Guests are strongly urged to check with the Thailand govt for the complete list of entry requirements depending on your nationality.

@KimDuffield1 I'm sorry to hear this Kimberly. We're moving all of our chat engagements. Send us a message via Charlie the chatbot thru: https://t.co/zvAz6wDXJv then simply scroll down the lower right side of the CEB Homepage to find the icon, & ask Charlie to connect you to a live chat agent.

@DIce51837565 Hi DIce. Fresh eggs are not allowed. We discourage guests to bring fresh eggs in their hand carry as this requires additional clearance from the Bureau of Quarantine. Additionally, this item is highly fragile and is prone to breakage and spillage.  Stay safe.

data.text: @Ken86180508 Hi Ken! Vape/E-cigarettes are permitted for hand carry baggage. If with built in battery, please Turn it upside down and must be individually protected to prevent accidental activation. The vape juice should also not exceed 100ml per bottle. See you!

data.text: @KerstineVelarde Sorry KerstineVelarde but police clearance are not considered as Valid ID. Valid ID we accept are ID cards which reflects on its face the name, picture, date of birth, and nationality of the guest checking-in.

@jendeukieluvv Hi NINI. Perfumes may be allowed in your hand carry. Bottle of perfume must not exceed 100ml. Basis of the restriction will be container, which should not exceed 100ml. Power banks must be carried in hand-carry baggage only and must NOT exceed 100Wh. Hair blower are for check in.

@james_journals I'm sorry to hear this JPF. You may do the following troubleshooting and then try again. -Clear your browser's cache and cookies -Use another device (e.g. laptop, desktop computer, etc.) - Use Google Chrome browser. For mobile app, ensure that the version is updated. Stay safe.

@KerstineVelarde Hi Kerstine. Valid ID we accept are "ID cards" which reflects on its face the name, picture, date of birth, & nationality of the guest checking-in. Company or School ID, passport, or govt-issued ID. SSS, GSIS, Driver’s License, Unified Multi-Purpose ID, PRC ID, PWD ID or OSCA.

data.text: @lising_maite I'm sorry to hear this Maite. Let me see if I can have this expedited. I'll request for a case owner to get in touch with you soon. Kindly wait for our reply. Stay safe!

@jenlinadc Hi ♡! Cooked food for personal consumption is allowed in hand carry as long as it does not emit strong odors (i.e., dried fish, shrimp paste, etc.). Please ensure that it's properly packed and sealed to avoid any spills in the cabin. Stay safe!
@TomSy7 Got this TomSy. I'll make a follow-up with the case owner and we should be able to reply to you very soon.

@artsyeology We are sorry if you are having a hard time to connect with our live chat agent Artsyeological. You may kindly accomplish our Guest Feedback Form thru this link https://t.co/7yR2XSIMwc and we will respond to you through the email you provided.
@TomSy7 I'm sorry to hear about this experience TomSy. Can I have your case number or chat session number so I could do a follow-up with the agent?

@DIce51837565 Hi DIce! If you are having a hard time to connect with our live chat agent, you may kindly accomplish our Guest Feedback Form thru this link https://t.co/7yR2XSIMwc and we will respond to you through the email you provided. Stay safe!

@joshdcb Hi 🤡. Some of our flights still operate as scheduled. In case of cancelation, a notification will be sent via email. For quick checking on real time status of your flight, you can use this link https://t.co/n8RpsOcAwS. Stay safe.

@GraceTHAi2011 Thank you for raising the concern and we are sorry to hear the inconvenience you may have felt, Grace. To check on this further, kindly message us thru https://t.co/GI0vBw2OWK and start chatting with our live agents. We'll wait for you there, Thanks!

Kahit anong OCTkasyon, or just because trip mo lang to relax and unwind, we gotchu Juan! Fly as soon as you book to any Philippine destination for as low as P88 one-way base fare, you can use your travel fund too! Sale period til Oct 16 only, Book now at https://t.co/taKDgpUG24! https://t.co/1zI4BBbOvO
@kes7140 Glad to hear that you were able to access your booking already. If any other questions arise, please feel free to contact us at any time. Have a good day and thank you!

@kingjayr2002 We are sorry ro hear you frustrations, Silvester. Thank you as well for raising the concern. To assist you further, kindly message us thru https://t.co/GI0vBw2OWK and chat with our live chat agents or thru Guest Feedback Form via this link: (https://t.co/7yR2XSIMwc). Thank you.
@bahogbetlog_ You're welcome and have a good day!
@bahogbetlog_ Hi bb! Hair iron and alike item are only allowed for check-in. Thank you
@lalalikit Hi Lalikit! Amount will reflect as pending which must be settled to reconfirm the ticket. Otherwise, passenger cannot be accepted for flight if the amount due is left unsettled. Thank you
@lising_maite You may also send your concern through Guest Feedback Form, Maite. Visit this link https://t.co/7yR2XSIMwc and we will respond to you through the email you provided. Thank you.

data.text: @LouIe12021079 Hi Lou! Laptop / desktop / personal computer can be accepted in your hand carry, as long as it follows the dimensions and allowance for hand carry. Thank you
@lising_maite Hi! May we ask for the case number so we can check on it? Thank you

@kes7140 Thank you for raising the concern and we are sorry to hear the inconvenience you may have felt, @kes7140. To check on this further, kindly message us thru https://t.co/GI0vBw2OWK and start chatting with our live agents. We'll wait for you there, Thanks!

@rolandiggy Thanks for raising the concern, @rolandiggy. To check on it, kindly message us thru https://t.co/GI0vBw2OWK and chat with our live chat agents or thru Guest Feedback Form via this link: (https://t.co/7yR2XSIMwc). We'll wait for you there, Thank you.
@abcdef_yuuuu Your case number can be found in the subject email. Please send and send it here so we can assign it to the handler. Thank you.

@artsyeology Sorry to hear this, artsyeology. We are here to listen. For assistance and security of your personal information, please send us a message through Charlie. Visit https://t.co/GI0vBw2OWK, click on the link and start chatting with Charlie the Chatbot and our live agents. Thanks!

data.text: @abbieallover Sorry to hear this, abbieallover. Upon checking, our website is up and running. For now, you may do the following troubleshooting and then try again. -Clear your browser's cache and cookies -

@sobe21 Hello sobe21! Yes, lechon may be accepted for check-in as long as it's packed and sealed properly. Note that package must also follow baggage rules. Visit https://t.co/ovQWze7Cal for more information. Hope this helps!

@fangirl0705 Hello fangirl0705. We will be glad to look into it. For assistance and security of your personal information you may send the details of your concern through: https://t.co/GI0vBw2OWK and ask Charlie to connect you with the live agent. Our team will be glad to assist you. Thanks!

data.text: @zeronuts07 You can present the hard copy or soft copy from your mobile phone. Thanks!

@MsShasha27 Hello Ms.Shasha. The carriage of live animals will be handled by our Cargo Team since they are not allowed onboard. For your inquiry, kindly contact them - Manila (02) 802-7070, Cebu (032) 340-9700. Hope this helps!

@sammalvero Hi Samm, thanks for reaching us. To check on your concern and for assistance, kindly message us thru https://t.co/GI0vBw2OWK and start chatting with our live agents. We'll wait for you there, Thanks!

@theaarondiaz We are sorry to hear your frustrations, Aaron. To assist you and to check on your concern, kindly message us thru https://t.co/GI0vBw2OWK and start chatting with our live agents. We'll wait for you there, Thanks!

@iamenna23 Hi there,iamenna. We will be glad to look into your concern. To further assist you and the security of your information, please send us a  message  via Charlie the chatbot  thru: https://t.co/zvAz6wDXJv .Or, send us a private message through: https://t.co/gNaqWVnrV6. Thanks!

data.text: @iamenna23 Hi there, Iamenna. Sha here. How may I help you?

@zeronuts07 Hi Hazel.  RTPCR test may still be required to Manila from Japan depending on the category  and purpose of travel. For more information  on travel requirements and flight guidelines,  you may  click this link: https://t.co/lBwTdCJvJb. I hope this helps.  Thank you!
@fluffball_yoons HI @fluffball_yoons. Yes you may bring salt but for personal consumption only.  Thanks!
@michael_migz Alright Michael. Have a great day ahead!

@uKKC7ZD1vG95LWX Hi @uKKC7ZD1vG95LWX.  To check the available schedules and  great value fares of CDO, DVO and MNL  flights, please visit our website at https://t.co/bU2K2M97fc. Hope to see you on board soon. Thanks!
Tana, travel wais-ly! Fly ta bai with CEB for fast trips, low fares, safe and contactless flights! Book na bai at https://t.co/taKDgpVdRC! ✈️ https://t.co/wbcuZoBF25

data.text: @abcdef_yuuuu Hi Nana! May we have the Customer Care Reference Number of the email so we can check and endorse it? Thank you
@michael_migz Hib Michael! Thanks for raising the concern. To check on it, kindly message us thru https://t.co/GI0vBw2OWK and chat with our live chat agents. We'll wait for you there, Thank you.

@laura_chloee Hi Laura! For a better CEB customer experience, we're moving all of our chat engagements here: https://t.co/GI0vBw2OWK. Click on the link and start chatting with Charlie the Chatbot and our live agents! We'll wait for you there, Thanks!

@ArrozJaypee Hi Jaypee! If you wish to book for a specific fare, route and/or flight schedule, please visit our website at https://t.co/kPgrcWAGam.  For the latest seat sale, you may refer to https://t.co/kGsg6DVkSv. Thank you and hope to see you onboard!
@razcrypto19 Or, message us thru https://t.co/GI0vBw2OWK and start chatting with our live agents. We'll wait for you there, Thanks!
@razcrypto19 Hi @razcrypto19! The email address you are trying to reach is no longer valid. You may instead send your concern thru our Guest Feedback Form via this link: (https://t.co/7yR2XSIMwc).

@ryljeno Hi @rylouisse! Middle name is optional when booking a flight. As for the suffix, you may place it either on the Last or First name depending on how it is shown in the valid ID to be presented. Thank you

@kaliwangkamay Thank you for raising the concern and we are sorry to hear the inconvenience you may have felt, @kaliwangkamay. To check on this further, kindly message us thru https://t.co/GI0vBw2OWK and start chatting with our live agents. We'll wait for you there, Thanks!
